get_changeset_nodes_since_date.sql:
SELECT cs.node, pl.date, pl.push_id, br.name as 'branch_name'
                    FROM changesets as cs
                    LEFT JOIN pushlogs as pl ON cs.pushlog_id = pl.id
                    LEFT JOIN branches as br ON pl.branch_id = br.id
                    WHERE pl.date > ? AND pl.date < ? AND br.name IN (REP0)

get_branch_pushlog.sql:
SELECT p.id AS 'pushlog_id',
                          p.push_id,
                          p.date,
                          c.node,
                          b.id AS 'branch_id',
                          b.name
                   FROM pushlogs AS p
                   LEFT JOIN changesets AS c ON p.id = c.pushlog_id
                   LEFT JOIN branches AS b ON p.branch_id = b.id
                   WHERE REP0 AND ( p.date >= ? AND p.date <= ?)
                   ORDER BY b.name, p.date ASC

get_all_branch_pushlogs.sql:
SELECT p.id AS 'pushlog_id',
                          p.push_id,
                          p.date,
                          c.node,
                          b.id AS 'branch_id',
                          b.name
                   FROM pushlogs AS p
                   LEFT JOIN changesets AS c ON p.id = c.pushlog_id
                   LEFT JOIN branches AS b ON p.branch_id = b.id
                   WHERE REP0
                   ORDER BY b.name, p.date ASC

get_node_from_revision.sql:
SELECT p.id AS 'pushlog_id',
                          p.push_id,
                          p.date,
                          b.id AS 'branch_id',
                          b.name,
                          c.node
                   FROM pushlogs AS p
                   LEFT JOIN changesets AS c ON p.id = c.pushlog_id
                   LEFT JOIN branches AS b ON p.branch_id = b.id
                   WHERE INSTR(node, ?) AND b.name = ?
